rukus.text: arrangers u kolonakh
blamers tsykh buty osudzhenyy
reciters povidomlenʹ
Vash boh tilʹky
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta Lordom skhodu
My prykrasyly naybilʹsh nyzʹki nebesa z prykrashayuchymy planetamy
My pylʹnuvaly tse z kozhnoho z·hubnoho chorta
Vony ne mozhutʹ rozvidnyk na Vysokomu Suspilʹstvi; vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ bombarded z kozhnoyi storony
Vony buly zasudzheni; vony zaznaly vichnoho retribution
Yakshcho budʹ-yaki yim pidpryyemstva zvynuvatyty zovnishni mezhi, vin pryyizhdzhaye ukladenyy z zhorstokyy projectile
Prosyatʹ yikh, vony bilʹshe tyazhki stvoryuyutʹ, abo inshi stvorennya?" My utvoryly yikh z volohoyi hryazyuky
V toy chas, yak vy awed, vony vysmiyuyutʹ
Koly nahadaly, vony ne berutʹ uvahu
Koly vony bachatʹ dokaz, vony ridicule tse
Yak kazhutʹ, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom ta kistkamy, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
Rivni nashi starovynni predky
Kazhete, "Tak, vy budete forcibly sklykatysya
Vse tse bere nudge, whereupon vony (vstayutʹ) dyvlyatʹsya
Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas; tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Vyroku
Tse yavlyaye soboyu denʹ rishennya shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
